bike.description: Epic FSR M5 alloy, 29" geometry, fully manipulated frame w/ ORE DT/TT, sealed cartridge bearings, 90mm travel, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Fox/SBC remote Mini-Brain, inertia valve, w/ Brain fade adjust
Custom SBC/RockShox Reba S29 Carbon, 100mm travel, One-piece tapered carbon crown/steeer tube, Rockshox Reba Team lower, titanium motion control damper, L/O w/floodgate adjust.
1 1/8" - 1 1/2" Threadless, Campy style upper and lower cartridge bearing.
Shimano M770 XT, DMD, top swing, dual pull
Thomson Elite Setback w/ 12 degree clamp, M: 367mm L/XL:410mm
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, reflectors, owners manual
